title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta or bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta, then quickly stir in the egg mixture.
Season with salt and black pepper, then serve immediately.
